name: Hello World (itch) (Vincent Reynier)
description:
Hello World is a simplified turn-based survival game in which you manage a struggling village in the wilderness. Explore your surroundings, build houses, collect or grow your food, expand your village and complete objectives in each level. The game features two modes :

  • Campaign : a series of 7 increasingly complex scenarios, designed to teach you the game's mechanics before presenting you with specific challenges to overcome. This is the recommended mode for new players.
  • Random : play on a completely random map, or customize the generation system's settings to your preference. In this mode new objectives are constantly generated to provide a potentially endless experience. See how long you can survive !
Controls :
  • Menus : Left Mouse Button to select menus, Escape to go back to previous screen.
  • In-game : 
    • Left Mouse Button : perform the default action on a tile
    • Right Mouse Button : open the radial menu for action selection, or hide menus
    • Mouse Scroll Wheel : zoom in and out
    • WASD or Arrow keys : move around the level
    • Spacebar : end the current day (all remaining actions will be lost)
    • Q and E : cycle through available houses
    • O : open the 'Objectives' menu
    • C : open the 'Construction' menu
    • Escape : hide currently open menus or shows the Save/Load screen
How to Play : 

Check out the in-game Help screen for information on the game's mechanics. It can be accessed by clicking on the '?' button in the main menu (after loading/starting a game) or in the Save/Load screen when in a level.

Thank you for playing ! Feedback would be greatly appreciated.
